Diary of Lydia:

The thirtieth day of the month of Shilen.


Tomorrow is an important day! I nesmogla talk with the Father. Word Nidrah'a now has too many values​​!

Royal Guide Run'y raslableny for ages, and something had to happen! Eilhalder brother said that our family should first get on Run'y sewn up, not the royal family!

I'm not sure, and I do not believe in all this ...

Nidrah came to me this evening. He soobshil me that no matter what I decided, I should always show their courage during the terrible time. What did he mean by that? I have always been brave!

Turn the page.
